description: A lightweight, high-performance jacket built for comfort and protection on or off water. Waterproof-breathable multilayered construction sheds water and wind while a soft-touch lining delivers next-to-skin comfort. Zip hand pockets, back vents, and adjustable hood, cuffs, and hem provided added utility and comfort.
name: Columbia Sportswear PFG Omni-Tech 3D Jacket - Mens
